file_content.text: Hello? You're the Jedi they were sending, yes? I--I can't talk any louder, someone might hear.
I'm Nadia Grell. My father and the other Senators--we were all invited here by the Chancellor.
Then the ship was attacked. Boarded. By people calling themselves "Sith".
Nadia, make sure no one can find you before we talk anymore.
Are you somewhere safe?
I'm in an air vent on the command deck. I can't go too far from the bridge.
Is everyone alright?
Any injuries?
The captain's dead. He was so nice... and the crew. Most of them are dead, too.
Do you have any idea what the Sith are up to?
What do they want?
I don't know. But I've seen them tampering with the engines.
The one in charge is called Arrax; he just cut his way through the crew. Then he ordered all the Senators onto the bridge and locked it.
My father's in there! But I can't get to him. I just hid.
Don't fret, Nadia. None of this is your fault.
It's alright.
Please, you have to save him.
If I can reach them, I can protect the Senators, and your father.
Can the bridge be unlocked?
Arrax would have probably killed you if you'd tried anything.
You'd be dead otherwise.
I know. I couldn't....
There's a console on one of the lower decks that can open the bridge. Here, I'll send you the location.
Please help us. If they're doing something with the engines, there might not be much time.
Please hurry. I saw the Sith tampering with the engines. We might not have a lot of time.
